features: Package includes 10 pack steam mop replacement pads for Shark steam pocket mop S3500 series S3450, S3452, S3455K, S3501, S3501SPN, S3501WM, S3502C, S3504AMZ, S3550, S3601, S3601C, S3601CO, S3601D, S3601K, S3601Q, S3601W, S3601WC, S3801, S3801CO, S3901, S3901A, S3901C, S3901D, S3901FS, S3901K, S3901Q, S3901W, S3901WC, S3901WM, S2902, SE400, SE450 . (B0028MB3HM, B07K1VGJ8N, B08QW8P2K6, B0B92NFFMW, B00FGBRS7Q, B07PRQ1QHG, B01JZMMUEW, B0BZ95Z565)

Made of 70% Polyester and 30% Polyamide fabric for effective cleaning, strong water absorption. The sandwich mesh lining allows steam to be released more easily. Velcro fastener with elastic opening ensures a fit.
Features: Reusable, durable, machine washable, quick drying, effective cleaning, highly absorbent, strong decontamination, anti-scratch, non-depilation, easy to install and replace.

These durable, multi-use steam mop pads cleaning for all your sealed hard floors, like marble, laminate, tile and wood floor. Great for your daily cleaning of home/house/room/kitchen/office floor cleaning.
MEET YOUR NEEDS. If you have any questions about the steam mop replacement pads, please contact us, we are committed to offer the premium products and efficient customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a replacement mop cloth for my shark pro steam mop. I HATE the cloth it came with as it always left steaks on the floor. I picked this because it isn't shag like the original mop. So no more streaks!Fits perfect on my shark pro, picks up dirt like nothing else and washes out like brand new. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality mop pads, excellent value
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to order these mop pads due to the fact that they were so inexpensive. I assume that they must be very cheaply made by thought I would give it a try. They are actually good quality and I purchased 10 for less money than 3 pads from the mop manufacturer. I was very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to replace my completely worn out shark steam pads. They fit perfectly and I'm so happy that the package came in a 10 count. They clean up super easy just by soaking in a bucket of oxygen wash and then machine wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit a little tight
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these a month ago and use them daily. They are starting to thin out especially around the area where the steam comes out of my mop. I believe this is do to how tight you have to pull them to get them secured to the mop. You have to essentially stretch them until they Velcro which is not always easy. This could be fixed if the Velcro strip was half an inch wider. Otherwise they pick up dirt as intended and wash well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These fit and work
reviews.reviewText: This product is not oem product but it fits and does work on my steam mop and much better price than going oem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new set of pads for my shark steam mop. These replacement pads fit perfectly. The Velcro holds them in place nicely. Great price for a10 pack! I have tile flooring throughout my entire house. I find these pads on the steam mop do the best job. Pass are machine washable. I do not dry them to prevent shrinking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like my steam mop and being able to get this many pads at such a reasonable price is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very durable and washable. They lasted long.
Tal cual la imagen y especificaciones
